F

file - package file
 
FileDistributor - Class in file
Description of FileDistributor class:
This class is used to send files from a given location (shared_folder) over a given serverSocket.
FileDistributor(ServerSocket, String) - Constructor for class file.FileDistributor
 
FileFinder - Class in file
 
FileFinder() - Constructor for class file.FileFinder
Description of FileFinder class:
This class is used to search a given location (path), to find all files that exist there and should be later shared.
FileFinder - Class in peer.file
Description of FileFinder class:
This class is used to search a given location (path, for example "C:/Shared Folder/"), to find all files that exist there and should be later shared.
FileFinder() - Constructor for class peer.file.FileFinder
Finds the files in the given location and creates SharedFile objects of them, then returns an ArrayList of these objects
FileReceiver - Class in file
Description of FileReceiver class:
This class is used to receive files to a given location (downloaded_folder) over a given Socket.
FileReceiver(String, int, String, int) - Constructor for class file.FileReceiver
 
findNow(String) - Static method in class file.FileFinder
 
findNow(String) - Method in class peer.file.FileFinder
Finds all the files inside the specified location
